channel.title: Adding a teleport
channel.description:
I'm just trying to add a command to go to home and to add a command to go to a staff zone
here is what i am putting
[code=java]if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2905, 3611, 0, "modern"); } [/code]
here is the error i am getting
[code=java]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:650: error: class, interface, or enum expected if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:652: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What should i do? thanks

item.title: Adding a teleport
item.dc:creator: @hack3r hack3r
item.description:
@hack3r wrote:

why would he do that?
he just needs to space it.
here.

if (playerCommand.equals(“home”) && (c.playerRights >= 0)) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(####, ####, 0, “modern”);
c.sendMessage(“Welcome to home!”);
}

Make sure its spaced… so eg

} <-- start at a parsing
if (playerCommand.equals(“home”) && (c.playerRights >= 0)) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(####, ####, 0, “modern”);
c.sendMessage(“Welcome to home!”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a teleport
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

try this :

} if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3093,3493, 0)); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "<col=00ff00>Welcome home, "+player.getDisplayName()); return true; }
